Description:
1 x Improvement Notice -  KF/IN/280322/08/03 - You have failed to ensure that each part of a construction site must, so far as is reasonably practicable, be kept in good order and those parts in which construction work is being carried out are kept in a reasonable state of cleanliness; namely you have failed to ensure the site is clear of slip and trip hazards arising from the 
build up of bricks and other site debris.

1 x Improvement Notice -  KF/IN/280322/08/02 - You have failed to fence off the front of the construction site, so far as is reasonably practicable, in the interests of health and safety.

1 x Improvement Notice -  KF/IN/280322/08/01 - You have failed to provide suitable & sufficient welfare facilities that comply with Schedule 2 of the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2015 in that, you have failed to provide suitable and sufficient sanitary 
conveniences, hot or warm running water in the immediate vicinity of the sanitary convenience and a suitable rest area.

1 x Prohibition Notice P N/KF/280322/08/02 - You have failed to ensure that your employee's exposure to a susbtance hazardous to health, namely respirable Chrystalline Silica is prevented or where not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that you failed to provide 
water supression and RPE for cutting bricks.

1 x Prohibition Notice P N/KF/280322/08/01 - Suitable and sufficient steps have not been taken (tower scaffold with missing edge protection and boards) to prevent,so far as is reasonably practicable, persons falling from a distance liable to cause serious personal injury.

1 x Prohibition Notice P N/KF/280322/08/01 - Suitable and sufficient steps have not been taken (no edge protection on the stairway or 1st and 2nd floor landings) to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, persons falling from a distance liable to cause serious personal injury.
